DOC.brief_summary: Continuous positive airway pressure ( CPAP ) use premature infant maintain lung open facilitate gas exchange . When ventilation/perfusion ( V/Q ) mismatch present , area lung open gas exchange match area lung receive blood gas exchange . This study measure responsiveness V/Q mismatch change amount ( level ) CPAP .
DOC.brief_title: Impact CPAP Level V/Q Mismatch Premature Infants
DOC.criteria: 1 . Born 2835 week gestational age ( GA ) best obstetric estimate , determine clinical obstetric team antepartum admission . 2 . Chronologic age 24 hour 28 day , measured time date birth . 3 . On continuous CPAP support 48 cm H2O great 24 hour , document bedside infant flow sheet . 4 . Supplemental oxygen requirement , fraction inspire oxygen ( FiO2 ) 0.25 least 2 consecutive hour , document bedside infant flow sheet . 1 . Congenital anomaly , determine clinical supervising physician . 2 . Current prior air leak syndrome , determine clinical supervising physician .
